transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan bolo tum.
Executive: Hello. Haan, haan ji sir, Shruti baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Sir, abhi is number pe discussion hua tha. To sir, aap office aa gaye? Mujhe meeting link share karna tha.
Customer: Aap IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hai kya?
Executive: Ji, ji, ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Ek minute haan.
Customer: Ye...
Customer: Naam kya hai aapka madam?
Executive: Mera naam Shruti hai.
Customer: Shruti.
Executive: Shruti haan.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji hello.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, hello.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. A, madam, haan, abhi discussion hua tha na already madam se bhi hua hai. To unhone meeting ke liye unhone aapko bulaya tha. To main vahi aapko guide karne ke liye maine aapko call kiya hua hai. To meeting link maine aapke register mail ID pe madam bheji hui hai. Right? To aap usko join kar lijiye meeting jisse main apni screen present karke na aapko sari cheezein kya hai.
Customer: Meeting abhi, abhi hamare sir abhi available nahi hai madam.
Executive: Suniye.
Customer: Okay. Kal subah, kal subah hum phone karenge aapko kal subah.
Executive: Okay, morning mein aap call rahe ho na? Right.
Customer: Haan, kal subah morning mein.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay.
Executive: To ye hamare...
Executive: Aapki Komal madam se sir ki baat hui thi na?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji madam. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai na. Meri aani, a, nahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haan, haan, abhi aapko aaya hai mujhe aawaz. Haan ji, to aap morning mein join karoge sir ke sath? Ki aap abhi ye aap join karna cha rahe ho? Agar aap abhi join karna chahte ho to main aapko, ji.
Customer: Abhi nahi sir, hamare sir abhi available nahi hai.
Executive: Achha. Hello.
Customer: Ji, ji boliye.
Customer: Haan, kal subah mein, kal subah mein join karenge sir.
Executive: Abhi hamare sir abhi available nahi hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Ji. Okay. Ji. Thik hai madam, thik hai.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not available for the meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to reschedule the meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the meeting next morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, reschedule, unavailable
